price: Na Mwenyezi Mungu anaita kwendea Nyumba ya Amani, na anamwongoa amtakaye kwenye Njia Iliyo Nyooka.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ دَارِ ٱلسَّلَٰمِ وَيَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ
footnotes: Na Mwenyezi Mungu anawaitia waja wake kwa Imani na vitendo vyema wendee Peponi, makao ya amani na utulivu. Na Yeye Subhanahu humwongoa amtakaye - kwa kuwa kesha jitayarisha vyema na kaelekea kheri - kwenye Njia ya Haki, nayo ni ya Salama.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yadʿū ilā dāri al-salāmi wayahdī man yashāu ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
